title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Road Construction
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around     Road Construction                Road Construction       Updated April 2, 2014  There are no road closures due to construction at this time.   For up-to-date access information, please call the Interagency Visitor Center (year round) at 906-387-3700 or the Grand Sable Visitor Center (summer only) at 906-494-2660.
